arcade.patch.sim

Class PatchSeries

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.sim.Series
      • arcade.patch.sim.PatchSeries

  • public final class PatchSeries
extends Series
    Simulation manager for PatchSimulation instances.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int depth
      Depth of the simulation.
      int depthBounds
      Overall height of the simulation (equal to 1 if DEPTH = 1, or DEPTH + MARGIN otherwise).
      MiniBox patch
      Map of patch settings.
      int radius
      Radius of the simulation.
      int radiusBounds
      Overall radius of the simulation (equal to RADIUS + MARGIN).

                   Box parameters,
                   boolean isVis)
        Creates a Series object given setup information parsed from XML.
        Parameters:
        setupDicts - the map of attribute to value for single instance tags
        setupLists - the map of attribute to value for multiple instance tags
        path - the path for simulation output
        parameters - the default parameter values
        isVis - true if visualized, false otherwise
